data.eml:eml: A phylogenetic analysis and taxonomic revision of the oribatid mite family Malaconothridae (Acari: Oribatida), with new species of Tyrphonothrus and Malaconothrus from Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Colloff, Matthew J., Cameron, Stephen L. (2013): A phylogenetic analysis and taxonomic revision of the oribatid mite family Malaconothridae (Acari: Oribatida), with new species of Tyrphonothrus and Malaconothrus from Australia. Zootaxa 3681 (4): 301-346, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3681.4.1
